org.joyrest.context

Interface ApplicationContext

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    ApplicationContextImpl

    public interface ApplicationContext
    The heart of the JoyREST Framework that contains all needed configuration for successful running the framework. It doesn't do any work just store the information about the framework and application that is built on that.
    Author:
    pbouda
    See Also:
    ApplicationContextImpl, Configurer

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Map<Class<? extends Exception>,InternalExceptionHandler> getExceptionHandlers()
      Returns all instances of exception handlers that were added into an application
      Set<InternalRoute> getRoutes()
      Returns all instances of InternalRoute that were added into an application
